siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
blogPost.body: Per Diem makes it easy for local businesses to sell subscriptions online, and gives them all the tools they need to build their own Amazon Prime.
blogPost.title: Per Diem - Subscriptions for local businesses
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Per Diem使本地企业可以轻松地在线销售订阅，并为他们提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。
Per Diem使本地企業可以輕鬆地在線銷售訂閱，併爲他們提供建立自己的Amazon Prime所需的所有工具。

previous.excerpt: Rent the Backyard builds backyard homes for people to house their family, use as a home office or rent for extra income. The process is as fast as 12 weeks, (2 weeks in your backyard). Eco-friendly tech & software lets us build up to 40% cheaper & 2x as fast.
previous.title: Rent the Backyard - Add a backyard home to rent, host your family, or work from

localize.description: 租后院为人们建造后院房屋，用于安置家人，作为家庭办公室或出租以获得额外收入。这个过程快至12周，（2周在您的后院）。环保的技术和软件让我们的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一个后院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或从工作。

localize.description: 租後院爲人們建造後院房屋，用於安置家人，作爲家庭辦公室或出租以獲得額外收入。這個過程快至12周，（2周在您的後院）。環保的技術和軟件讓我們的建造成本降低40%，速度提高2倍。
localize.tagline: 增加一個後院的房子出租，接待你的家人，或從工作。

next.excerpt: Share your workouts from Apple Health and supported services through beautiful and unique story templates. Track your distance goals and earn collectible achievement medals on your journey.
next.title: Any Distance - Share your workouts, track your goals, earn achievements.

localize.description: 通过精美独特的故事模板，分享你在 Apple Health 和支持服务中的锻炼成果。追踪你的距离目标，并在你的旅程中获得可收藏的成就奖章。
localize.tagline: 分享你的锻炼，跟踪你的目标，赚取成就。

localize.description: 通過精美獨特的故事模板，分享你在 Apple Health 和支持服務中的鍛鍊成果。追蹤你的距離目標，並在你的旅程中獲得可收藏的成就獎章。
localize.tagline: 分享你的鍛鍊，跟蹤你的目標，賺取成就。
